outline:
1. upon, over, on account of, above, to, against
    1. upon, over, on account of, regarding, concerning, on behalf of
    2. over (with verbs of ruling)
    3. above, beyond (in comparison)
    4. to, against (of direction)
kjv_def: about, against, concerning, for, (there-) fore, from, in, [idiom] more, of, (there-, up-) on, (in-) to, [phrase] why with.
strongs_def: {above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications}
